name: Cow Bay
description: Welcome to Cow Bay! A magical place where you can relax, build your own farm, and raise adorable cows. Manage your resources and expand your island in this charming idle game.

name: Temple Run 2
description: The addictive mega-hit Temple Run is now out! All your friends are playing it - can you beat their high scores?! You've stolen the cursed idol from the temple, and now you have to run for your life to escape the Evil Demon Monkeys nipping at your heels.

name: Bee Swarm Simulator
description: Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator. Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards!

name: Soccer Skills World Cup
description: Lead your national team to glory in the Soccer Skills World Cup! Compete in thrilling matches, showcase your dribbling and shooting skills, and become a world champion.

name: Online PVP
description: Engage in intense online player-versus-player combat. Test your reflexes and strategy against players from around the world in this action-packed shooter.

name: Eaglercraft
description: Explore a blocky, procedurally generated 3D world. Mine resources, craft tools, and build structures in this creative sandbox game.

name: Super Star Car
description: Get behind the wheel of a high-speed vehicle in Super Star Car. Race against skilled opponents, upgrade your car, and dominate the track.

name: Stick Fighter
description: Enter a world of stick-figure mayhem! Fight against other stickmen in dynamic, physics-based battles. Use a variety of weapons to come out on top.

name: Gobdun
description: Venture into a dark dungeon filled with goblins and other monsters. Fight for survival, collect loot, and prove your mettle in this challenging battle game.

name: Riddle Transfer 2
description: The sequel to the popular puzzle-adventure game. Continue the story, solve intricate riddles, and interact with a quirky cast of characters to uncover the mystery.

name: Riddle Transfer 1
description: Embark on a point-and-click adventure full of clever puzzles and engaging storytelling. Can you solve the riddles and escape?

name: Chicken Merge
description: Merge chickens to create new and powerful breeds! Build your chicken army, fight off enemies, and become the ultimate chicken tycoon in this addictive idle game.

name: ZOOM-BE
description: Team up with a friend in this cooperative puzzle-platformer. Control two zombie friends, help each other overcome obstacles, and find your way to the exit.

name: Appel
description: Play as Appel, a cute character on a big adventure. Navigate through challenging platforming levels, collect items, and reach the goal.

name: Angry Birds Space
description: The Angry Birds are back, and this time they're in space! Use gravitational fields to your advantage as you fling birds to destroy pig-built structures.

name: Penalty Shooter 2
description: Experience the thrill of a penalty shootout. Choose your team, aim carefully, and score goals to win the tournament. Can you handle the pressure?

name: Rally Racer Dirt
description: Get ready for some off-road action in Rally Racer Dirt. Drive powerful rally cars on challenging dirt tracks and race against the clock to get the best time.

name: Angry Birds Halloween
description: Celebrate Halloween with the Angry Birds in this spooky-themed edition. Launch birds to topple structures and defeat the pigs in festive, challenging levels.

name: Riddle School 5
description: The adventure continues in Riddle School 5. Help Phil escape from a high-security facility by solving a series of clever and humorous puzzles.

name: Riddle School 4
description: Phil is back in Riddle School 4. This time, he finds himself in a new school with even more challenging puzzles. Can you help him escape once again?

name: Riddle School 3
description: The third installment of the popular puzzle series. School is a bit different this time, and Phil needs your help to navigate its strange corridors and solve its secrets.

name: Riddle School 2
description: School's back in session, and so are the puzzles! In Riddle School 2, you'll need to use your wits to find a way out of the classroom once more.

name: Angry Birds
description: The classic game that started it all. Use a slingshot to launch birds at structures to destroy the pigs who stole their eggs. A true test of skill and physics.

name: Riddle School
description: Trapped in a boring math class, you must find a way to escape. Solve a series of point-and-click puzzles to make your getaway in the original Riddle School.

name: Big Tall Small
description: A clever puzzle game where you control three characters with different abilities. Use their unique skills to solve puzzles and complete each level.

name: Pong
description: The original arcade classic. Control a paddle and hit the ball past your opponent. Simple, addictive, and timeless.

name: Pokemon - Emerald
description: Relive the classic Pokemon adventure in the Hoenn region. Catch, train, and battle with your Pokemon to become the champion of the Pokemon League.

name: The Password Game
description: A uniquely challenging puzzle game where you must create a password that follows an increasingly bizarre set of rules. How far can you get?

name: Little Alchemy 2
description: Start with four basic items and combine them to discover hundreds of new ones. A simple yet deep crafting game of creativity and discovery.

name: The Final Earth 2
description: Build a bustling city in space! Manage resources, construct buildings, and keep your citizens happy in this relaxing city-building game.

name: Run 3
description: Run and jump your way through a series of challenging levels in outer space. The twist? The walls and ceilings are your new floors. Don't fall!

name: Backrooms
description: Navigate through an endless maze of eerie, empty rooms. A game of exploration and suspense. Can you find a way out?

name: Poor Bunny
description: Help a hungry bunny collect all the carrots in each level while avoiding dangerous traps. A challenging and cute arcade game.

name: Bad Time Simulator
description: Face off against a powerful foe in this challenging battle simulator. A tough-as-nails game for those who love a good challenge.

name: Among Us
description: A game of teamwork and betrayal. Work together to complete tasks on a spaceship, but beware of the impostor among you whose goal is to eliminate everyone.

name: Papa's Pizzeria
description: Take orders, bake pizzas, and serve customers in Papa's Pizzeria. A classic time-management game where you run your own pizza shop.

name: Achtung Die Kurve
description: A simple yet highly addictive multiplayer game. Control a constantly growing line and try to avoid crashing into walls or other players.

name: Hole.io
description: Control a black hole and consume everything in your path. Grow bigger and bigger as you swallow up the city in this chaotic and fun .io game.

name: Bloons TD 4
description: The classic tower defense game is back! Place monkey towers to pop waves of colorful balloons. Features new towers, upgrades, and tracks.

name: Idle Miner
description: Manage your own mine and become a tycoon! Hire miners, automate your workflow, and collect resources to grow your mining empire.

name: Masked Forces
description: Join the elite masked forces in this action-packed first-person shooter. Play online against other players in various game modes and maps.

name: SuperHero.io
description: A superhero-themed .io game where you collect orbs to grow and defeat other players. Evolve your superhero and dominate the arena.

name: Shady Bears
description: Protect your bears from the sun by moving them into the shade. A simple but challenging game of timing and quick thinking.

name: Snow Rider 3D
description: Ride a sleigh down a snowy mountain at high speed. Dodge obstacles, collect gifts, and see how far you can go in this thrilling 3D endless runner.

name: Lingo
description: A classic word-guessing game. You have a limited number of attempts to guess a secret word. A fun way to test your vocabulary.

name: Banana Poker
description: A fun and fruity twist on the classic game of poker. Play against opponents, make the best hand, and win all the bananas!

name: Bingding of isaac : wrath of the lamb
image: game-images/Bingding of isaac _ wrath of the lamb.png
description: Enter a basement full of monsters and secrets in this action-packed roguelike shooter. With randomly generated levels, every run is a new adventure.

name: Polytrack
description: Race on futuristic, low-poly tracks in this stylish racing game. Master the controls, drift around corners, and set new records.

name: Bomb Word Filler
description: A fast-paced word game where you must think on your feet. Come up with words containing a specific letter combination before the bomb explodes.

name: Age of War
description: A classic strategy game where you evolve your army through different historical ages. Defend your base and destroy the enemy's to win.

name: Age of War 2
description: The battle continues in Age of War 2. With new units, upgrades, and special abilities, this sequel takes the epic strategy gameplay to the next level.

name: Earthwalker
description: A unique game of balance and precision. Walk on a rotating planet and avoid falling off. How long can you survive?

name: Wikipedia Speedruns
description: A game of knowledge and speed. Race against the clock to navigate from a starting Wikipedia article to a target article using only the links within the text.

name: Gobble
description: A fun and frantic eating game. Gobble up smaller items to grow bigger, but avoid larger opponents who can eat you!

name: Stick Defenders
description: Defend your position from waves of stickman enemies. Hire units, upgrade their abilities, and use powerful skills to hold the line.

name: Level Devil
description: A deceptively simple platformer with a devilish twist. The levels are full of unexpected traps and trolls. Can you keep your cool and reach the end?

name: Super Speeder
description: A high-speed avoidance game. Pilot a ship through a hazardous tunnel, dodge obstacles, and survive for as long as possible.

name: Swingo
description: Swing through challenging levels in this physics-based platformer. Time your swings perfectly to overcome obstacles and reach the goal.

name: Blumgi Castle
description: A fun and explosive battle game. Place bombs strategically to defeat your enemies and send them flying off the castle.

name: Stickman Ragdoll Fight
description: Engage in chaotic physics-based fights as a stickman. Use a variety of moves and weapons to defeat your opponents in this ragdoll fighting game.

name: Stickman Run
description: A fast-paced running game starring a stickman. Jump over obstacles, slide under barriers, and see how far you can run.

name: Mimelet
description: A charming platformer where you can absorb the powers of your enemies. Use their abilities to solve puzzles and explore the world.

name: Stickman Parkour 3
description: Perform amazing parkour stunts as a stickman. Run, jump, and climb your way through a series of increasingly difficult levels.

name: Blumgi Dragon
description: Play as a cute dragon in this action-packed skill game. Fly around, defeat enemies, and collect gems to become the most powerful dragon.

name: 1v1 Lol
description: A fast-paced online third-person shooter where you can build structures to defend yourself. Test your building and shooting skills in intense 1v1 battles.

name: Tiger Simulator 3D
description: Experience life as a majestic tiger in this 3D simulation game. Explore a vast open world, hunt for food, and raise a family.

name: Champions League
description: Compete in Europe's most prestigious soccer tournament. Choose your team and lead them to victory in the Champions League.

name: DreadHead Parkour
description: A stylish parkour game with a unique dreadlocked character. Run and jump across rooftops, perform cool tricks, and avoid falling.

name: Golfinity
description: An endless mini-golf game. Play through an infinite number of procedurally generated levels and see how many holes-in-one you can get.

name: Rocket League
description: A high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem. Drive rocket-powered cars and score amazing goals in this fan-favorite game.

name: Fruit Ninja
description: The original fruit-slicing sensation. Swipe your screen to slash fruit while avoiding bombs. A juicy and addictive arcade game.

name: G-Switch 4
description: The latest installment in the G-Switch series. Run through challenging levels and switch gravity to overcome obstacles. Play with up to 8 players.

name: YoHoHo.io
description: A pirate-themed battle royale .io game. Fight other pirates, collect gold, and become the most feared pirate on the high seas.

name: Master Chess
description: The timeless game of strategy and tactics. Play against the computer or a friend and prove you are a true chess master.

name: Bob The Robber 4
description: Bob is back for another adventure! This time, he's in France. Help him sneak past guards, avoid cameras, and pull off a series of daring heists.

name: Decent
description: A challenging platformer that will test your skills. Navigate through a series of difficult levels filled with traps and obstacles.

name: Dadish
description: A charming platformer where you play as a radish who also happens to be a dad. His kids have gone missing, and he needs your help to find them.

name: Gunspin
description: A unique physics-based shooter where you use the recoil of your gun to move. Master the art of the gunspin to defeat your opponents in stylish duels.

name: Stickman MineSweeper 2
description: A creative mix of platforming and minesweeper. Navigate stickman through a level while using clues to avoid hidden mines.

name: Europe Cup
description: Compete in the European soccer championship. Choose your national team and lead them to victory in this exciting soccer game.

name: Parkour Race
description: Race against others in a fast-paced parkour game. Run, jump, and slide your way to the finish line to become the parkour champion.

name: Stickman Hook
description: Swing like a spider-stickman through hundreds of challenging levels. A fun and addictive physics-based game of timing and skill.

name: Crossy Road Space
description: The classic Crossy Road gameplay goes intergalactic! Hop across floating platforms and avoid space traffic in this endless arcade hopper.

name: Boxing Random
description: A hilarious physics-based boxing game. Each round has random challenges and physics, making every match unpredictable and fun.

name: Basket Random
description: Experience basketball like never before in this wacky, physics-based game. Play with random characters on random courts for endless fun.

name: Volley Random
description: A fun and chaotic volleyball game with ragdoll physics. Each match is different, with random characters and unpredictable gameplay.

name: Mini Battles
description: Challenge your friends in a collection of fun and simple one-button minigames. Perfect for two players on the same device.

name: Blumgi Ball
description: A fun and bouncy basketball game. Aim your shot, launch your character, and score amazing baskets in this physics-based puzzler.

name: Blumgi Slime
description: Play as a cute, bouncy slime in this action-packed platformer. Jump and dash your way through levels filled with obstacles and enemies.

name: Blumgi Bloom
description: A relaxing and beautiful game about growing flowers. Plant seeds, watch them bloom, and create your own colorful garden.

name: Blumgi Rocket
description: Drive a rocket-powered car at incredible speeds. Race through challenging tracks, perform amazing stunts, and reach the finish line.

name: Recoil
description: A puzzle-platformer where you use the recoil from your weapon to propel yourself through levels. A clever twist on the genre.

name: Fire Boy and Water Girl 2
description: The Light Temple is the setting for the second adventure of Fireboy and Watergirl. Work together to solve puzzles and navigate the temple's challenges.

name: Fire Boy and Water Girl 3
description: Explore the Ice Temple with Fireboy and Watergirl. Use their elemental powers to overcome new puzzles involving light and reflection.

name: Fire Boy and Water Girl 4
description: The Crystal Temple awaits! This time, Fireboy and Watergirl must use crystal portals to solve puzzles in this cooperative platformer.

name: Fire Boy and Water Girl 5
description: In Fireboy and Watergirl 5: Elements, explore temples based on all the previous games. A great challenge for fans of the series.

name: Fire Boy and Water Girl 6
description: The latest adventure for our elemental duo. In Fireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales, you'll need the help of fairies to solve puzzles and pass levels.

name: Slope 2
description: The sequel to the popular 3D running game. Roll down a randomized slope, avoid obstacles, and try to get the highest score in this addictive and challenging game.

name: Choppy Orc
description: Help a little orc chop wood and avoid branches. A simple one-button game that tests your timing and reflexes.

name: Pepernoten Pong
description: A festive twist on the classic game of Pong, themed around Dutch holiday treats. A fun and simple arcade game for all ages.

name: PietenSprong
description: A fun jumping game with a Dutch holiday theme. Help the character jump from one platform to another and see how high you can go.

name: Pepernotensjoelen
description: A digital version of the traditional Dutch game of Sjoelen, but with holiday treats. Slide the pepernoten into the correct slots to score points.

name: Rhomb
description: A minimalist puzzle game where you rotate rhombuses to match colors. A relaxing and aesthetically pleasing game for puzzle lovers.

name: Cubinko
description: A unique puzzle game inspired by pachinko and plinko. Drop cubes and watch them bounce off pegs to reach the goal.

name: Trap the cat
description: A strategic puzzle game where you must trap a cat by clicking on tiles to block its path. Can you outsmart the cunning feline?

name: Zombie Outbreak
description: Survive a zombie apocalypse in this intense top-down shooter. Fight off hordes of zombies, find supplies, and try to stay alive.

name: OVO Dimensions
description: The stick-figure parkour game is back with new dimensions. Run, jump, and slide through even more challenging levels in this fast-paced platformer.

name: Dyna Boy
description: Explore a dangerous cave in this action-packed platformer. Use dynamite to blast through walls and defeat enemies on your quest for treasure.

name: GROWMI
description: A clever puzzle game where you control a growing snake-like creature. Navigate through tight spaces and solve puzzles by managing your length.

name: Shootz
description: A fast-paced top-down shooter with a variety of weapons and enemies. Survive as long as you can against relentless waves of opponents.

name: Stacktris
description: A unique twist on the classic game of Tetris. Stack falling blocks to build a tower, but be careful not to let it topple over.

name: Tag 2
description: A fun and fast-paced game of tag. Play as a stick figure and try to avoid being 'it' in this multiplayer-style game.

name: Gladihoppers
description: A hilarious physics-based gladiator fighting game. Battle against other gladiators in the arena and become the champion.

name: Yarn
description: A charming retro platformer made with Pico-8. Play as a ball of yarn and navigate through a colorful and creative world.

name: Picohot
description: A Pico-8 demake of the popular first-person shooter where time moves only when you move. A stylish and strategic shooter.

name: Cell Machine
description: A logic puzzle game about building contraptions. Place different types of cells to create machines that solve each puzzle.

name: Draw The Hill
description: Draw your own road for your car to drive on. A creative and physics-based game where you must navigate your vehicle to the finish line.

name: Hextris
description: A fast-paced hexagonal puzzle game. Rotate the hexagon to match colors and clear blocks before they stack up to the top.

name: Impossible Quiz
description: A notoriously difficult quiz game full of trick questions and puns. Do you have what it takes to answer the impossible?

name: Kitten Cannon
description: Launch a kitten from a cannon and see how far it can go. Use various items and explosives to extend its flight in this classic casual game.

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: The legendary first-person shooter that pioneered the genre. Escape from a Nazi prison, fight guards, and take down the regime.

name: Wordle
description: The viral word-guessing game. You have six attempts to guess a five-letter word. A new puzzle is available every day.

name: Beyond The Grave II
description: An action-packed battle game where you fight off hordes of undead enemies. Use a variety of weapons and abilities to survive.

name: Run 2
description: The sequel to the popular running game. Explore new levels, characters, and challenges in this 3D platformer where you can run on walls and ceilings.

name: Vex
description: The first game in the Vex series. A challenging stickman platformer where you must run, jump, and slide your way through deadly levels.

name: Vex 2
description: More traps, more challenges, and more Vex action. The second installment brings new levels and obstacles to test your platforming skills.

name: Vex 4
description: A true test of precision and timing for platformer fans.

name: Vex 5
description: The fifth chapter in the Vex saga introduces new mechanics and challenges.

name: Vex 6
description: The latest installment of the Vex series is here!

name: Vex 7
description: The latest installment of the Vex series is here!

name: Hobo 1
description: Play as a hobo on a rampage in this classic beat 'em up game.

name: Hobo 2
description: The hobo is back and causing even more trouble.

name: Hobo 3
description: After escaping from prison, our hobo hero is wanted by the army.

name: Hobo 4
description: The hobo finds himself in a new country and continues his rampage.

name: Hobo 5
description: The hobo finds himself in hell.

name: Hobo 6
description: It's time to fight demons and other hellish creatures in Hobo 6: Hell.

name: Hobo 7
description: The final chapter of the Hobo saga.

name: Cut The Rope
description: A physics-based puzzle game where you must cut ropes to feed candy to a cute little monster named Om Nom.

name: Cut The Rope Holliday
description: A festive edition of the popular puzzle game.

name: Cut The Rope Time Travel
description: Join Om Nom as he travels back in time to feed his ancestors with candy.

name: Rising Lava
description: A fast-paced platformer where you must outrun rising lava.

name: Virtua Racing
description: A classic arcade racing game with a distinctive polygonal art style.

name: Prism
description: A beautiful and relaxing puzzle game about light and color.

name: Flappy Bird
description: The infamously difficult one-button game.

name: Eggy Car
description: A physics-based driving game with a fragile cargo.

name: OVO
description: A fast-paced stickman platformer focused on parkour.

name: Slope
description: A 3D endless runner where you control a ball rolling down a randomized slope.

name: Monster Tracks
description: Get ready for some off-road action in Monster Tracks.

name: Doodle Jump
description: The classic endless jumper.

name: Murder
description: A game of intrigue and assassination.

name: Tomb of the mask
description: A fast-paced arcade game set in a vertical labyrinth.

name: Moto X3M
description: A thrilling bike racing game with challenging levels and crazy stunts.

name: Futbol11
description: A realistic and engaging online soccer game.

name: Moto X3M Pool
description: The bike racing action continues in a new poolside setting.

name: Moto X3M Spooky
description: Get ready for a spooky ride in this Halloween-themed edition of Moto X3M.

name: Moto X3M Winter
description: Race through a winter wonderland in Moto X3M Winter.

name: Cats
description: A fun and action-packed game where you build your own battle bot and fight against other players.

name: Tiny Fishing
description: A relaxing and addictive fishing game.

name: Drive Mad
description: A physics-based driving game where you must navigate through challenging obstacle courses.

name: Bitlife
description: A life simulation game where you can live out any life you can imagine.

name: Temple Run
description: The original endless runner that took the world by storm.

name: HexGL
description: A futuristic, fast-paced racing game.

name: Cube Field
description: A simple yet addictive avoidance game.

name: Tetris
description: The timeless puzzle game.
A sliding puzzle game where you combine numbered tiles to reach the elusive 2048 tile.

name: Jack Smith
description: A crafting and time-management game where you play as a blacksmith.

name: Time Shooter 2
description: A first-person shooter where time moves only when you do.

name: Happy Wheels
description: A hilarious and often brutal physics-based game.

name: CircloO
description: A physics-based puzzle game where you control a ball in a circular level.

name: Champion Island
description: A retro-style sports RPG.

name: Garden Gnomes
description: A charming and addictive distance game.

name: Say what you see!
description: A fun and challenging puzzle game where you decipher rebus puzzles.

name: Sandboxels
description: A relaxing and creative falling-sand game.

name: Fluid Simulation
description: A beautiful and interactive fluid simulation.

name: Snake
description: The classic game of Snake.

name: Super Mario Bros
description: The legendary platformer that defined a generation.

name: Mario Kart 64
description: The classic kart racing game from the Nintendo 64.

name: Ice Cube Smash
description: A cool and refreshing arcade game.

name: Incredibox
description: A music-making game where you can create your own beats with a merry crew of beatboxers.

name: Death Run
description: A true test of your reflexes and timing.

name: Chrome Dino
description: The classic endless runner game you play when you're offline.

name: Monkey Mart
description: Manage your own supermarket in this fun and cute idle game.

name: Gun Mayhem
description: A fast-paced and chaotic platform shooter.

name: Bloons
description: The original balloon-popping puzzle game.

name: Bad Piggies
description: A creative physics-based puzzle game.

name: Minesweeper
description: The classic logic puzzle game.

name: Swords and Souls
description: A fun and addictive RPG with a unique training system.

name: Rogue Soul
description: A stylish endless runner game.

name: Rogue Soul 2
description: The adventure continues in Rogue Soul 2.

name: Geometry Dash
description: A fast-paced platformer game with rhythm-based gameplay. Jump, fly, and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles in this challenging and addictive game.
